# ldesign-empty



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Empty 空状态组件
用于展示空数据状态

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description | Type                                | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `description` | `description` | 空状态描述文字     | `string`                            | `'暂无数据'`    |
| `image`       | `image`       | 图片地址        | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `imageSize`   | `image-size`  | 图片大小        | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`    | `'medium'`  |
| `imageType`   | `image-type`  | 预设图片类型      | `"default" \| "search" \| "simple"` | `'default'` |
